Updated location and menu information.
Improved user experience.

Updated location and menu information.
Improved user experience.

Welcome to Steak ’n Shake’s new app designed to give guests the power to quickly and securely pay with their mobile phone in-store and earn loyalty rewards!

FEATURES
- Mobile Payment: now pay in-store with one touch utilizing LevelUp’s secure scanners
- Rewards: Earn, track and redeem your rewards in the Steak ’n Shake Rewards Program
- Store Locator: Find participating stores near you, directions, and store hours
- Menu: View menu photos, product information, prices and nutritional information and get digital receipts right to you phone

Welcome to Steak ’n Shake’s new app designed to give guests the power to quickly and securely pay with their mobile phone in-store and earn loyalty rewards!

FEATURES
- Mobile Payment: now pay in-store with one touch utilizing LevelUp’s secure scanners
- Rewards: Earn, track and redeem your rewards in the Steak ’n Shake Rewards Program

-Minor bug fix
-Minor bug fix
-Minor bug fix
- Updated the tip box for added clarity
- Updated the tip box for added clarity
- Updated the tip box for added clarity

- We’ve moved sending Digital Gift Cards to the tab bar from the Settings menu
- Clarified that an account (new or existing) can be funded by migrating a gift card
- You can now migrate a gift card directly from the Manage Funds screen & during registration
- Gift card migration now requires entering the 3-digit CVV found on the back of the card
- Passbook integration
- Now optimized for larger iPhone screen sizes

- Passbook integration

- Created a more flexible integration with Apple Pay for new users/registrations to rapidly setup their accounts and earn extra credit.
- Streamlined the ability for users to rate the app and provide feedback
- Improved Setting menu layout
- Improved the Locations feature to display store information more clearly
- Provided store address in Transaction History log (along with date and amount)
- Fixed a few bugs affecting older phones and other minor enhancements.

Our Rewards Club app got a makeover! If you’re already a club member, update the app now and be sure to migrate your existing points and rewards. If you’re new to the club, download the app today and get a FREE Specialty Shake!
- Fixed crash after successfully submitting a Support ticket.
